page.title: 11The Hastings Holiday Centre
page.content: An open air bathing pool opened 52 years ago at the west end of Hastings promenade.Olympic measurements and high diving boards drew swimmers from a wide area.Leased from the local council,the rather neglected pool is now part of a holiday camp.Older folk use the camp in the first and last 6 weeks of the Easter to October season. Families with schoolchildren come in August.Linked chalets line the pool.At Â£60 a week it provides full board and entertainment for 300 people. Visitors and locals use its 2 large rooms,dance floor,bar,snooker,amusements and squash courts all year.A storm last Winter filled many ground floor chalets with shingle,ruining furnishings.The restored pump again cleans the pool,one of the few large South coast ones left.The Hastings Holiday Centre still has potential.
